name: TOMBS
description: Descend into an extremely frustrating and maddening network of rooms. Known as the TOMBS. Here you will find death lurking around every corner.  This is not a horror game, there are just lots of deadly traps, (as in only two variations spread about in different ways). As for the difficulty, there's just no knowing. Sometimes you get 6 rooms and other times 58. Have Fun! (By the way this is a roguelike). This game is best, played in the browser.
